title: Kitsune no Koe (Voice of Fox)
synopsis: The series follows 16-year-old Hu Li, who dreams of becoming a popular singer. However, he has neither good looks nor the financial means to pursue his dream, so Hu uploads his singing online using a fox avatar.
characters: ['Hu, Li', 'Tong, Chuyun', 'Kong, Que', 'Ji, Hetian', 'Kim', 'Xu, Er', 'Yu, Xin', 'Zhang, Yao', 'Hong, Ye']
voices: ['Kawanishi, Kengo', 'Kouri, Arisa', 'Suganuma, Hisayoshi', 'Hino, Satoshi', 'Hayami, Show', 'Maeda, Rena', 'Aoki, Shiki', 'Kimura, Subaru', 'Motoyoshi, Yukiko']
staff: [['Ochi, Koujin', ['Director']], ['Kikuta, Hiromi', ['Sound Director']], ['Kano', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Narita, Yoshimi', ['Series Composition']]]
